txt.en: This banner bears the symbol of the White Hand, the charge of the traitor Saruman. Saeradan will certainly wish to know of this.

'You found a banner bearing the sign of the White Hand. It is no secret that Saruman the White has a strong influence over the Men of Dunland, but we did not know that he troubled Enedwaith...there are few inhabitants, and they keep to themselves.\n\n'If Saruman's influence has indeed reached into Enedwaith, many of these strange happenings are easily explained.'
Near the place called Gwyllion's Gate, you found a banner bearing the symbol of the White Hand.
Talk to Saeradan at Echad Saeradan
Saeradan is at Echad Saeradan, west from Gwyllion's Gate.\n\nYou should tell Saeradan of the banner you discovered.
